Header: 241 Brigade Provides Breakfast to Flood Victims
Content: Troops of 241 Brigade as a part of their community projects, offered breakfast to 32 families, displaced due to floods in Nawakkadu, Alaiyadivembu in the Divisional Secretariat area of Ampara District on Sunday (8). Considering emergency circumstances, 241 Brigade Commander, Colonel W. B.J.K Wimalaratne directed his troops to undertake the project with a view to promoting goodwill and reconciliation efforts in the area.
